text: Ah... you have come. The mist... it parts for you, does it not?
Or perhaps... it is merely waiting to swallow you whole.
The Veil has not lifted, child. It has... thickened. The Sun is but a memory.
Take this. It is a 'Seed of Warding'.
Do not flinch. It is warm, yes? Like fresh blood.
Go to Emberfall Keep. Find King Valen. He... he understands the hunger.
Find Drekkar. He knows the truth of the Prison Stone.
Go now. Before the shadows realize you are awake.
Why do you linger?
The Seed... it grows hungry. Feed it with your journey.
Do not trust your eyes. They lie. Only the Seed sees true.
Hee hee! More guests? Or more... ingredients?
Oh, it's you. The one Mira spoke of in the whispers.
You must stop him! Drekkar! He wants to start the Revelry!
Stay away from the bog. The mud... it screams.
Don't look at me!
They say the scarecrows move when you blink.
I saw my brother yesterday. He's been dead for ten years.
He told me to join the feast...
Stay away from the bog. The mud... it screams.
I wander, lost, searching for something I cannot name.
The forest whispers, but I cannot hear.
The Veil hides many truths, but I see beyond it.
Beware the shadows that hunger for your fear.
I escaped the horrors, but they still chase my mind.
Run, before they find you too.
Anomalies are rising. I hunt them, but they hunt back.
Stay close, the darkness is listening.
I fled the madness, now I hide in silence.
Do not disturb the quiet.
Greetings, traveler. I sense a latent power within you.
The magical currents are disturbed lately.
If you seek knowledge, prove yourself by mastering the elements.
Excellent work finding me. You have potential.
I have taught you the Fireball spell. Use it wisely.
Potions! Ethers! Bombs! I have it all!
But alas, my stock is running low on Potions.
Could you find me some? I'll pay handsomely.
Ah! You found them! Thank you, kind traveler.
Here is your reward. Come back anytime!
